name: aframe
description: Building blocks for the VR Web

scripts.build: mkdir -p build/ && npm run browserify -- --debug -o build/aframe.js
scripts.dist: mkdir -p dist/ && npm run browserify -s -- --debug | exorcist dist/aframe.js.map > dist/aframe.js && uglifyjs dist/aframe.js -c warnings=false -m -o dist/aframe.min.js
scripts.preghpages: npm run dist && rm -rf gh-pages && mkdir -p gh-pages && cp -r {.nojekyll,dist,lib,examples,index.html,style} gh-pages/. 2>/dev/null || : && git checkout dist/ && replace 'build/aframe.js' 'dist/aframe.min.js' gh-pages/ -r --silent
scripts.release:bump: npm version patch --preminor && git commit -a -C HEAD --amend
scripts.release:push: npm login && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
